thread.section_title: Hotel WO - Wilson Opera - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel close to the train station
thread.title_full: Nice hotel close to the train station - Review of Hotel WO - Wilson Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Remy F
title: Nice hotel close to the train station
text:
Stayed at the Wilson Opera for 3 nights. Very friendly staff and very good service throughout. They will always tell you that they've upgraded you but I am not sure how true that is... it's cute though!
Rooms are clean and tidy... and tiny but hey, this is Paris after all!
About the location, it is ideal if you need to get on a train at the St Lazare station (less than 5mn walk). Also close to many restaurants and major department stores (FNAC, Galleries Lafayette, Printemps).
Breakfast is served in a small room in the basement with a nice selection of pastries, fresh baguette, cereals but no warm dish.
Last, you can get a fairly cheap and very comfortable shuttle arranged to go to Roissy Airport. Great service.
